mapper.select:
SELECT wi.id, wi.CODE, wi.NAME, wi.quantity, wi.transaction_type, wi.create_date, wi.unit_price, wi.inbound_order_number, wi.delivery_order_number,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit, FROM warehouse_info wi LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.`code` = wi.`code`) WHERE 1 = 1 AND wi.transaction_type = 0
AND mi.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.materialsName},"%")
ORDER BY wi.create_date DESC

SELECT wi.id, wi.CODE, wi.NAME, wi.quantity, wi.transaction_type, wi.create_date, wi.unit_price, wi.inbound_order_number, wi.delivery_order_number,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit,
eai.min_value FROM warehouse_info wi LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.`code` = wi.`code`) LEFT JOIN early_alert_info eai ON (eai.materials_code = wi.`code`) WHERE 1 = 1 AND wi.transaction_type = 0
AND mi.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.materialsName},"%")
ORDER BY wi.create_date DESC

SELECT wi.id, wi.CODE, wi.NAME, wi.quantity, wi.transaction_type, wi.create_date, wi.unit_price, wi.inbound_order_number, wi.delivery_order_number,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit, FROM warehouse_info wi LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.`code` = wi.`code`) WHERE 1 = 1 AND wi.inbound_order_number = #{code} ORDER BY wi.create_date DESC

SELECT wi.id, wi.CODE, wi.NAME, wi.quantity, wi.transaction_type, wi.create_date, wi.unit_price, wi.inbound_order_number, wi.delivery_order_number,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit, FROM warehouse_info wi LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.`code` = wi.`code`) WHERE 1 = 1 AND wi.delivery_order_number = #{code} ORDER BY wi.create_date DESC
